title: Seduction's Kiss
description: *Prequel novella to Lure (The Allure Chronicles #1)*Never agree to a road trip to New Orleans with your roommate. At least not when your roommate is dragging you along while she reconnects with an ex-boyfriend. Possible consequences of failing to take my advice:1) Unknowingly going out with a vampire stripper2) Getting kidnapped by said vampire's nest mates3) Falling head over heels for your winged heroBelieve it or not number 3 is the worst one, especially when no one believes you that he exists.
author: Alyssa Rose Ivy
